price: [Guyyaa] “wanti isin gabbaraa turtan eessa jiru?” isaaniin jedhame.
arabic: وَقِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡبُدُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: waqīla lahum ayna mā kuntum taʿbudūna
